bike.description: Hi-Ten 20" frame, 20.5" TT, MID BB shell, externally relieved integrated HT, formed monostay yoke, seat-stay mounted U-brake bosses, 5mm dropouts for 14mm axle

components.description: Hi Ten, Taper blades, 1-1/8" threadless, 5mm dropouts for 3/8" axle
Integrated FSA Impact, 1-1/8" threadless, Campy type cartridge bearings
Forged alloy front load drop type, 50mm extension, 1 1/8" A-Head
Cr-Mo 2pc., 8" x 28", 11 degree back sweep, 2 degree up
P. Grip BMX soft compound, closed end, flanged, 150mm
Tektro FX-340 U-brake, melt forged, single bushing, coil spring, 15mm offset arms, soft compound pads
Lever "U" brake, 15mm cable pull
KMC Z-510H, 1/2" x 1/8", anti-drop inner links
3pc. tubular Cr-Mo for 8 spline, 170mm length
Stamped steel, 25t
Mid BB, 2x sealed cartridge bearing w/ 19mm 8 spline Cr-Mo BB spindle, steel tube and plastic cone spacers
P. Lo-Pro plastic platform, loose ball, 9/16"
Alex, alloy single wall, pinned, 36h
Forged alloy low flange, Cr-Mo 3/8" axle, loose ball, 36h
Forged alloy cassette, 14mm axle, loose ball, 36h, 9t driver
2mm (14g) stainless
Specialized Rhythm Lite Sport, 20 x 2.2", 30TPI, wire bead
Specialized Rhythm Lite Sport, 20 x 2.2", 30TPI, wire bead
Schraeder valve
P. Combo, 1pc co-molded composite saddle and alloy seat post combination
Alloy, no offset, 25.4mm
Cr-Mo seat pin, allen key type
Owners manual, chainguard, reflectors
